original_text: When Jacob went into Egypt, and the Egyptians oppressed them, then your fathers cried out to the Lord and the Lord sent Moses and Aaron, who brought your fathers out of Egypt and made them dwell in this place.
korean_text: 야곱이 애굽에 들어간 후 너희 조상들이 여호와께 부르짖으매 여호와께서 모세와 아론을 보내사 그 두 사람으로 너희 조상들을 애굽에서 인도해 내어 이 곳에 살게 하셨으나

sentences.original_text: then your fathers cried out to the Lord
and the Lord sent Moses and Aaron,
who brought your fathers out of Egypt
and made them dwell in this place.
